description: Multiple events mentioned but all explicitly declined or negated. Speakers say 'NOT going', 'not attending', 'can't make it', 'said no'.

mock_llm_response.summary: No actionable calendar events found. All mentioned events were explicitly declined: party (NOT going), workshop (not attending), lunch (can't make it).

notes: Events are mentioned with specific times but every single one is negated. The model should not create events for things the speakers explicitly decline.
